desc: IOS and Android App.The app can be used by two group of people: buyers and sellers.The very main page of the app will contain two options Login or create new account.clicking the "Create new account" A choice of Buyer Or Seller will appear.the buyer creates a simple account (username, email, password and an email activation feature)the seller enters the Username, password and email. Their account creation will go to the database and be active when the admin approves. after registration a message will appear in the app saying "Please contact us via example@[url removed, login to view] to activate your account" and an email will be sent to his email saying the same.Buyer's side:The buyer will have three main selections in the main page after login of the app. First selection is (New request) the second is (My requests) and the last is (messages).1-New request page contains the following:-Three drop-down list selections:1-car brand 2-model 3-year. ----- These three options will be the title of the message that the seller will see.-Under the three drop-down lists will come the Message text box that the buyer will enter full description of their request and notes for the sellers.-City Drop-down list selection with an option to add more cites: the request will be sent only for sellers in same city the  buyer will determine.-Confirmation button to send the request.2-My requests page: this page displays the requests that were sent with the possibility to cancel/delete any request so the request will no longer be available for the sellers.3-Messages: This page is will show the message the buyer receives from the sellers with an option to delete the message or reply or block the sellers from sending anymore messages.Seller side:The seller logs in using their username and password.The seller will have three main selections in the main page of the app. First selection is (requests) the second is (messages) and the last is (profile).1-Requests: shows the request submitted by buyers only.2-Messages:This page is will show the messages the seller sends and receives from the buyers with an option to delete the message or reply or block the sellers from sending anymore messages.3-Profile:This page offers the option to choose which city/cites cover(this will make them receive request only in the cites they cover), also the seller can choose and change anytime the car brands they offer.Notes:Sellers will not be able to contact sellers or buyer without their requests.buyers will not be able to contact buyers or sellers without their requests.The app should be as simple and light as possible.the app should be connected to a database that can be accessed by admins.The app is meant to be published in the apple App Store and android app store so it should meet their requirements.a website doing the same function as the app will be under consideration to be created if the developer is capable of doing so.Thank you.
title: Cars scrap and spare parts

title: Sample IOS Objective C app that calls a C# WebService and posts JSON data

desc: I have a mobile app for ordering grocery online and manage the delivery, the app was built using ionic and it depends on backend (server side) which was built using Cakephp with mysql database. The app is missing some features which I need to complete within few days, as phase one, we need to do the following:1. Validate user input during registration phase.2. Verify user e-mail during sign up and activate account once he clicks on the registration e-mail.3. Add extra field to the registration form (drop list) to get the user area where he lives.4. Add a forget password option, to reset user password and send it to his registered e-mail.5. Add feature to allow users to register and login using social media accounts (Facebook and Google).6. Re-design two windows on the app and admin page on dashboard, where the user select the shops category and shops names, to include a space for Ads on the upper part, ADs will be managed by the admin dashboard.7. Send push notification (preferred by onesignal) for user once he place a new order, and once the shop received his order, and when the order is out for delivery, and to send a notification once the order is delivered and get user feedback/rating on a new window and save it to be displayed later by admin on dashboard.8. Send push notification to admin and modify admin dashboard to include a flashing counter for new orders received.9. modify all the text in the app to be able to translate it later into another language (Arabic) through mapping English words in the app to Arabic ones in a text file.10. Create a new layout/design of the app to support right to left.11. Prompt the user with first login to pick the language preferred and save it, and save it in future and auto load the selected language with every login.12. List of shops must be displayed based on the user location Lat/lng (shops within 5KM from user location) using GPS.The above is considered as phase one of the requirements, winner freelancer will be hired for long term to complete the next phases.Please bid only if you are expert in ionic, cakephp, php, mysql because we have very limited time. we need to finish all the preceding in 3-5 days. Please submit a reasonable bid price, over estimated bids will be ignored.More info will be shared with winning bidder.
title: Modify ionic app with cakephp backend

desc: I currently have an Android application being built that I need someone to finish. There's currently the use of a passcode and fingerprint authentication.The program authenticates again a JSON response based on the username and password given and allows access or not to the webview with a URL returned form the JSON response. This portion all works right now.While fingerprint capability is there, I want the user to be able to select if they want to store the fingerprint and passcode and what those values will be.If the user chooses to store the passcode, I want them to enter the code, confirm the code, and save the response.If they choose to allow fingerprint access (which is in place already), then when they open the app and go to a page in the app, it'll authenticate against and proceed if authorized.If they logoff the application, it'll restart the process.If you have the Dropbox application, Mint, bank, or any modern application will have this same setup.Let me know if you have any questions on completing this process.You must say the phrase "I 100% understand" in the message to even be considered.
